questions.question: This arc takes the Straw Hat Pirates to a sky island where they face off against a self-proclaimed God with lightning powers. What is...?
Set on a cloud island, this arc features a battle against a powerful Warlord of the Sea known for his fiery fists. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an underwater island and their encounter with a fish-man supremacist group. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows for the manipulation of wire. What is...?
This advanced form of Armament Haki allows the user to emit their Haki beyond their body to attack the inside of an object. What is...?
This technique allows its user to multiply their limbs and heads, as seen used by a certain Marine officer. What is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, a former member of the Donquixote Pirates, is known for his string-string fruit powers and role as a former Warlord of the Sea. Who is...?
This character, the leader of the On Air Pirates, is known for their Mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit, enabling them to transform into a model of the mythical creature Yamata no Orochi. Who is...?
